foundation.title: Let's Start with the Basics
foundation.subtitle: Tell us about yourself and your educational background.
foundation.locationPlaceholder: Enter your address or neighborhood (e.g., Pine Hills, Orlando)
foundation.locationHelp: We use this to find jobs within your commute range. Your exact address is never shared.

transportation.title: How Do You Get Around?
transportation.subtitle: This helps us find jobs you can actually reach.
transportation.commute: What's the farthest you can commute?
transportation.commuteHelp: One way, to get to work

availability.title: When Can You Work?
availability.subtitle: Let us know your schedule preferences.

salary.title: What Salary Do You Need?
salary.subtitle: We'll match you with jobs in your range.
salary.calculatorResult: Based on Orlando rent, with ${salary}/year you can afford:

challenges.title: Any Challenges We Can Help With?
challenges.subtitle: This is optional, but helps us find support resources.
challenges.prompt: Do you face any challenges we can help with?
challenges.trustBanner: Your challenges help us find support resources. We NEVER use this to filter jobs.
challenges.context: Anything else you'd like us to know?
